sentence.Network_en: Ventriloquism first developed as a means of communicating with the dead.
sentence.Network_cn: 一开始,腹语术是作为一种与死者沟通的方式发展起来的.

sentence.Network_en: People have been interested in ventriloquism for over 2000 years.
sentence.Network_cn: 2000多年来人们对口技一直很感兴趣.

means.word_mean: 1. the art of projecting your voice so that it seems to come from another source (as from a ventriloquist's dummy)

auth_sentence.content: Ventriloquism - If you are being pushed, strangers will very frequently address the person pushing you instead of yourself.
